#Question 2

```{r}

library(dplyr)
library(knitr)

courses |>
  arrange(course) |>
  rename(
    "course name" = course,
    "identifier" = course_id,
    "semester" = semester,
    "number of exams" = nb_grades
  ) |>
  kable()

```

#Question 4
```{r}


grades <- read_delim(
  here("Data", "grades.csv"),
  delim = "|",
  na = "$",
  col_types = cols(
    id = col_integer(),
    course_id = col_integer(),
    grade = col_double()
  )
)


```

#Question 7
First calculate age 
```{r}
library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)

students <- students |>
  mutate(age = time_length(today() - birth_date, unit = "year"))
```
```{r}
ggplot(students, aes(x = age)) +
  geom_density(bw = "sj") +
  geom_rug(alpha = 0.1)
```

#Question 8 

```{r}

median_age <- students |>
  summarise(
    median_age = round(median(age)),
    .by = group
  )

median_age |> kable()
```
#Question 9 
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
oldest <- students |>
  slice_max(age, n = 1, by = group) |>
  select(id, sex, age, group) |>
  arrange(desc(age))

oldest |> kable()
```
